channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report E-2024040301
item.description:
Report E-2024040301

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-15T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: TEXARKANA
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 3, 2024, one (1) 330-gallon tote of sodium hydroxide was damaged in transit due to a load shift and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior and pavement beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from MidSouth Environmental Services (MSES) to remediate the impacted site. MSES personnel utilized a degreasing agent with absorbent wipes to collect any product on the trailer floor. All sodium hydroxide-impacted material was collected and containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and MSES personnel took possession of the waste.

item.title: Report X-2024040294
item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-27
  • City: LOWELL

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: SOMETIME DURING TRANSIT TO THE DESTINATION FACILITY, THE PACKAGE WAS ON ITS SIDE CAUSING PRESSURE TO THE LID SEAL. THIS CAUSED LEAKAGE. PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TORTE DescribePack: LEAKAGE FROM LID SEAL DUE TO PRESSURE DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WS PLACED UPRIGHT IN HAZMAT BAG AND TOTE.
